sentences: Ma olen väsinud, pealegi on mul palju tööd.
Ta on hea inimene, aga pealegi on tal ka head sõbrad.
Mul on õnn, et ma võin teha seda tööd, pealegi saan ma selle eest tasu.
context: The word pealegi is used to indicate an additional point or reason, often to strengthen an argument or statement. It can be translated to English as moreover, furthermore, or in addition, and is commonly used in formal and informal writing, as well as in spoken language.
